But first we should ask if you have your AP broadcasting it's essid.  Is it?
sudo /sbin/iwconfig wlan0 "Radio Rebelde"
Open a terminal and type:  sudo /sbin/iwconfig wlan0 "Radio Rebelde"
.. and hit enter
(where "Radio Rebelde" is truly the essid of your Wireless AP.)
Open a terminal and type:  sudo /sbin/iwconfig wlan0 "Radio Rebelde"
Open a terminal and type:  sudo /sbin/iwconfig wlan0 essid "Radio Rebelde"
sudo /sbin/iwconfig wlan0 essid "Radio Rebelde"
sudo iwconfig wlan0 essid "Radio Rebelde"
